bad_channel.text: :tv: You have to be in a channel to do this.

bad_text.text: :thinking_face: Hmm, I don't know that command... Try `/${cmd} help`

help.text:
Members of ${channel} have access to a private Google Drive.
Invite other members into this channel to give them access!

attachments.text:
Use the `/${cmd}` command to access this channel's Google Drive folder
`/${cmd} help` will show this message
`/${cmd} link` will fetch the link to Google Drive
*Do not share files by link in this folder!*
:warning: Do not share files by link in this folder!

not_permitted.text: :crying_cat_face: Sorry, you aren't allowed to do this yet.
